Understate: The claim understates the fact that the phone number provided is only applicable to the United Way's COVID-19 Community Economic Relief Fund in a specific region (Indianapolis area) and is not available to people residing outside that area.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the phone number connects callers with the United Way's COVID-19 Community Economic Relief Fund nationwide or in all regions.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the phone number provided will connect callers with the United Way's COVID-19 Community Economic Relief Fund without specifying any regional limitations.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the United Way of Freeborn County and Rochester, Minnesota, which states that the phone number is specific to central Indiana and not applicable to other regions.
